title: ðŸ“° GDELT Data Enrichment Pipeline
description: Scrape raw GDELT articles based on a query and enrich them using Google Search and OpenAI for summary, sentiment, and entity extraction.

query.title: GDELT Search Query (Mandatory)
query.description: The GDELT query string (e.g., '"stock market" OR theme:ECON_BUSINESS'). Use capitalized boolean operators.

max_records_limit.title: Max GDELT Articles to Retrieve
max_records_limit.description: The maximum number of articles/records to retrieve from GDELT (Max 250).

timespan_offset.title: Time Range (Relative or Absolute)
timespan_offset.description: Specify a time span back from the present (e.g., '3days', '1week') or an absolute date range.

sort_by.title: Sort Results By
sort_by.description: The field to sort results by.

source_lang.title: Source Language Filter (Optional)
source_lang.description: Filter results to articles originally published in a specific language (e.g., 'english' or 'EN').
